name: Social Fast
description:
The new game that comes from the hand of Cold Start for the ZJAM22!!! Did you think that you have the speed and the reflexes to arrive on time? Try it with me and Social Fast, and score a new record!

This idea was born of the concept of the social media, what I've always seen or will see, how many people spends lots and lots of time with this silly box watching videos or posts that they won't ever remember, talking and commenting any thing any where without any awareness or just simply knowing nothing, or become more an more superficial. A small parody with conscientious object of showing how people can allow something as important as their lives to revolve around something whose price is too high to pay, forgetting what they really have around them, who they have, everything beyond a simple screen, giving his own meaning to their life, just empty and aimless compared to the things that are really worthwhile.

And finally, thank you very much for the team and jury behind having tested, played and invested their time in being able to understand this creation.

Controls: the whole keyboard.

Design and programming: DD

Art: Cocojambo(?)
